short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Configure background image on Azure Portal, highlight empty resource groups, and mask your username and Entra ID tenant name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension improves user Azure Portal experience.
- Configure Azure Portal background image
- Mask username and Entra ID tenant name
- Highlight empty resource groups

** Note this extension is not Microsoft official **
